verses.text: Great \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* greatly \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* praised \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* city \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God, \w His|strong="H7141"\w* holy mountain.

Beautiful \w in|strong="H3068"\w* loftiness, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth, \w like|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peaks \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zaphon \f + \fr 48:2 \ft Or in the far north; the most sacred mountain of the Canaanites was Zaphon \f* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* Zion, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* King.

God \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* citadels; \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* shown Himself \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fortress|strong="H7151"\w*.
\w For|strong="H3045"\w* behold, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* kings assembled; \w they|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* advanced together.
\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* astounded; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* fled \w in|strong="H4428"\w* terror.
Trembling seized \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, anguish \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w in|strong="H7200"\w* labor.

\w With|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wind \w from|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* east \w You|strong="H3205"\w* wrecked \w the|strong="H3205"\w* ships \w of|strong="H3205"\w* Tarshish.\f + \fr 48:7 \ft Or a fleet of trading ships\f*

As \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have heard, \w so|strong="H7307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have seen \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* Hosts, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* our God: God \w will|strong="H7307"\w* establish \w her|strong="H7665"\w* forever. Selah

\w Within|strong="H5704"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* temple, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* contemplate \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H7130"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w Your|strong="H7130"\w* praise, reaches \w to|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* ends \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth; \w Your|strong="H7130"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H2617"\w* full \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w Mount|strong="H4390"\w* Zion \w is|strong="H8034"\w* glad, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughters \f + \fr 48:11 \ft Or the villages\f* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Judah rejoice, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* judgments.
March around \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, encircle \w her|strong="H1323"\w*, count \w her|strong="H1323"\w* towers,
consider \w her|strong="H5608"\w* ramparts, tour \w her|strong="H5608"\w* citadels, that \w you|strong="H6726"\w* may \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* next generation.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w this|strong="H4616"\w* God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* God \w forever|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* ever; \w He|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* guide even till death.\f + \fr 48:14 \ft Or He will guide us beyond death\f*
